entry.title: Cloud VMs Tips
entry.summary:
Things on this page are fragmentary and immature notes/thoughts of the author. It is not meant to readers but rather for convenient reference of the author and future improvement.

  1. VPN/proxy

  2. Make sure you have needed ports open. I deployed a docker image for RStudio on my AWS EC2 â€¦
entry.content:
Things on this page are fragmentary and immature notes/thoughts of the author. It is not meant to readers but rather for convenient reference of the author and future improvement.

  1. VPN/proxy

  2. Make sure you have needed ports open. I deployed a docker image for RStudio on my AWS EC2 but cannot connect to it. It turned out that I did open the port that RStudio listens to.
